name: Samsung Galaxy S26
highlights:
Not announced yet
7.2mm thickness
Android 16, up to 7 major upgrades
128GB/256GB/512GB storage, no card slot

BODY.Build: Glass front (Gorilla Glass Victus 2), glass back (Gorilla Glass Victus 2), aluminum frame
BODY.SIM:
· Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM + eSIM + eSIM (max 2 at a time) - INT
· Nano-SIM + eSIM + eSIM (max 2 at a time) - USA
· Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM - CN
BODY:
IP68 dust tight and water resistant (immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)
Armor aluminum 2 frame

PLATFORM.OS: Android 16, up to 7 major Android upgrades, One UI 8.5
PLATFORM.Chipset:
Qualcomm SM8850-AC Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 (3 nm) - ROW
Exynos 2600 - Europe
PLATFORM.CPU: Octa-core (2x4.6 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix L + 6x3.62 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix M)

MAIN CAMERA.Triple:
50 MP, f/1.8, 24mm (wide), 1/1.56", 1.0µm, dual pixel PDAF, OIS
10 MP, f/2.4, 67mm (telephoto), 1/3.94", 1.0µm, PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom
12 MP, f/2.2, 13mm, 120˚ (ultrawide), 1/2.55" 1.4µm, Super Steady video
MAIN CAMERA.Features: Best Face, LED flash, auto-HDR, panorama
MAIN CAMERA.Video: 8K@24/30fps, 4K@30/60fps, 1080p@30/60/120/240fps, 10-bit HDR, HDR10+, stereo sound rec., gyro-EIS

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer
FEATURES: Samsung DeX, Samsung Wireless DeX (desktop experience support)
